712.80.text:
And when the war was won, we

752.07.text:
Omaha -- Normandy -- this

And our victory in that war

but shaped the security and

We worked to turn old

And I've told Cory's

1268.57.text:

at the State of

1274.20.text:

1278.53.text:
where I first met Cory and

1281.17.text:
right after they made their

1284.80.text:
The next time I saw him,

1287.77.text:
unable to speak or walk
after an IED nearly killed

1294.07.text:
But over the past five years,

1297.27.text:
learning to speak again and

1300.27.text:
And earlier this year, he

1304.07.text:
The first words Cory said to me

1306.80.text:
words first shouted all those
years ago on this beach:

1325.80.text: So Cory has come back today,

1327.80.text:
along with Melvin and
Jannise and Brian,

1329.50.text:
and many of their fellow
active-duty servicemembers.

1334.37.text: We thank them for their service.

1339.80.text:
They are a reminder that
the tradition represented

1349.83.text:
We are on this Earth for
only a moment in time.

1355.43.text:
And fewer of us have parents and
grandparents to tell us about

1358.20.text:
what the veterans of D-Day
did here 70 years ago.

1364.33.text:
As I was landing on Marine
One, I told my staff,

1369.40.text:
I don't think there's a time
where I miss my grandfather

1371.47.text:
more, where I'd be more happy to

1383.57.text:
So we have to tell
their stories for them.

1388.13.text:
We have to do our best to

1390.63.text:
the values that they were
prepared to die for.

1395.80.text:
We have to honor those who
carry forward that legacy,

1399.27.text:
recognizing that people
cannot live in freedom unless

1401.60.text:
free people are
prepared to die for it.

And as today's wars
come to an end,

1409.03.text:
this generation of servicemen

of uniform, and they, too,

1416.77.text:
They, too, will become

1418.90.text:
in commerce, in industry,

1422.50.text:
the leaders we need for the

1427.70.text:
And, God willing, they, too,
will grow old in the land

1433.40.text:
And someday, future generations,
whether 70 or 700 years hence,

1439.30.text:
will gather at places like this
to honor them and to say that

1445.30.text:
these were generations of men
and women who proved once again

1448.40.text:
that the United States of
America is and will remain

1450.73.text:
the greatest force for freedom

1455.07.text:
May God bless our veterans
and all who served

1457.87.text:
with them, including those who

1461.90.text:
And may God bless all who
serve today for the peace

1466.17.text:
May God bless the
people of France.

1469.30.text:
And may God bless our
